questList.questDescription: Unite the Sandswept Shadows under a common banner or eliminate the division plaguing them. Your choice will guide your path forward.
Forge an alliance with the Warden of Whispering Roots to strengthen your common resolve against the encroaching darkness.
Venture forth to extinguish the legendary Aurelian Dragonflame Sentinel that threatens to burn the sands to ash.
Choose to unite the Icerealm Frostbound or dismantle their icy alliance to secure a safer passage through the frostbitten expanse.
Harmonize with the crystals embodied by the Frostcore Golem to invoke soothing energies that aid your journey.
Unleash destruction upon the Wandering Iron Haunt that intimidates with ferocity in the frostbound expanse.
Stand against the darkness and defy the legendary Dreadcrypt Conjurer within the Ruins of the Shadowed Citadel.
Swear an oath of solidarity with the ethereal Wraithguardian Epoch to strengthen bonds crucial in your battle against the shadows.
Seize victory by extinguishing the strong Aurilian Flameguard who seeks to further envelope the ruins in fiery chaos.
